thread.title: Visiting Paris , staying at Prince Albert Louvre was like stay at home .!!! thanks
thread.title_full: Visiting Paris , staying at Prince Albert Louvre was like stay at home .!!! thanks - Review of Hotel Prince Albert Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MarcelaMuskan
title: Visiting Paris , staying at Prince Albert Louvre was like stay at home .!!! thanks
text:
*First of all: Excellent ubication Sincerely , you don't need to walk, but if you don't want , you also have REM stations very close... Close to Place Vendome, to the Louvre , to the Opera, you also are close to Tourist Information Office, restaurants, cafes, banks, etc and it's a very safe neighborhood !
***Something else : FOR CELIAC people : I found very close to the hotel , a celiac-friendly restaurant ( Brasserie Rejane , Av de L'Opera )
SO first tumb up: UBICATION
*second : the PRICE is optimal if you consider the wobderful location
*third: the hotel is installed on a wonderful old building, in very , very good conditions ( services like hot water, heater, TV , internet, etc are good ! ) and it is clean, tidy and the people working there are very nice ... so: SERVICES are very good
Anyway : The time I spent at Prince Albert Louvre , I felt at HOME , with new friends always ready to listen and help That's why I would like to say THANKS to all the people working at Prince Albert Louvre , but most of all to Hamid and Hajar , both of them kind, and ready to help you if you need!
Paris IS awesome... but stay at Prince Albert Louvre, let me enjoy it better ! MERCI ... I will visit you again FOR SURE !
Marcela Ruggeri
